name: BoomiWatch skip checking Molecule view file
description: Returns OK if Agent has skipped checking a molecule view file during latest run.

name: BoomiWatch skip checking API Gateway view file
description: Returns OK if Agent has skipped checking an API Gateway view file during latest run.

name: BoomiWatch checked Molecule view file
description: Returns OK if Agent checked a molecule view file during latest run.  Returns CRITICAL if unable to complete the check.

name: BoomiWatch checked API Gateway view file
description: Returns OK if Agent checked an API Gateway view file during latest run.  Returns CRITICAL if unable to complete the check.

name: BoomiWatch validated the agent configuration
description: Returns OK if Agent was able to validate configuration.

name: BoomiWatch set up datetime range for querying Boomi API.
description: Returns OK if Agent was able to set up datetime range for making Boomi API calls.

name: Boomi API calls permitted on this run
description: Returns OK if Boomi API calls will be attempted (and not skipped) on this run.

name: BoomiWatch skipped making Boomi API calls on this run
description: Returns OK if Agent declined to attempt Boomi API calls because it was too soon since last API call.

name: BoomiWatch Completed
description: Returns OK if Agent has completed all BoomiWatch checks.  Returns CRITICAL if unable to complete successfully.

name: BoomiWatch persisted the end datetime
description: Returns OK if BoomiWatch persisted the last used end datetime.

name: BoomiWatch called Boomi ExecutionRecord API
description: Returns OK if Agent called the Boomi ExecutionRecord API on this run.

name: BoomiWatch found some Boomi executions in the target date range on this run.
description: Returns OK if Agent queried Boomi ExecutionRecord API and found records in target date range.

name: BoomiWatch submitted execution metrics on this run.
description: Returns OK if Agent submitted metrics on this run, derived from Boomi ExecutionRecord API calls.

name: BoomiWatch submitted Boomi execution-record logs.
description: Returns OK if Agent was able to submit Boomi execution-record logs (not process logs) to Datadog.

name: BoomiWatch called Boomi AuditLog API
description: Returns OK if Agent called the Boomi AuditLog API on this run.

name: BoomiWatch found some Boomi AuditLogs in the target date range on this run.
description: Returns OK if Agent queried the Boomi AuditLog API and found records in target date range.

name: BoomiWatch submitted auditlog events on this run.
description: Returns OK if Agent submitted events on this run, derived from Boomi AuditLog API calls.

name: BoomiWatch called Boomi Events API
description: Returns OK if Agent called the Boomi Events API on this run.

name: BoomiWatch found some Boomi Events in the target date range on this run.
description: Returns OK if Agent queried the Boomi Events API and found records in target date range.

name: BoomiWatch submitted Boomi Event events on this run.
description: Returns OK if Agent submitted events on this run, derived from Boomi Event API calls.

name: BoomiWatch used a default value for last end datetime.
description: Returns warning if Agent could not parse Last End Datetime from file and had to use default value.

name: Failed to submit metric for a long-running execution.
description: Returns warning if Agent could not submit metrics showing the name and duration of a long-running Boomi process.

name: Checked if Boomi daemon or service is running.
description: Returns OK if Boomi daemon is running.  Returns Critical if verified that Boomi daemon is NOT running.

name: Checked if Boomi datacenter thinks that the runtimeis online.
description: Returns OK if Boomi datacenter reports the runtime (atom, molecule, or API gateway) as online; else returns Critical
